header.name: Veiled Vault of Dusk Claw
header.author: Watabou Generator
header.description: For several centuries the vault remained sealed. Currently it is badly infested by bears, indifferent to the history of the place. It is rumored that Bryxus, a legendary niddle, is hidden here.

rooms.name: room_1
rooms.description: A stuffed elf cleric with a strange, unnaturally light object in their hands.

rooms.name: room_2
rooms.description: A lavishly decorated gate to the south.

rooms.name: room_4
rooms.description: A mosaic of a claw pattern on the walls

rooms.name: room_3
rooms.description: A heart preserved in a jar, makes a person hallucinate when shaken.

rooms.name: room_5
rooms.description: A rotten chest holds a shield, some gold and an enchanted long sword.

rooms.name: room_7
rooms.description: A rear entrance into the vault. An explorer, muttering gibberish.

rooms.name: room_8
rooms.description: A mutilated body of a hobgoblin, a carved ivory medallion nearby.

rooms.name: room_6
rooms.description: A bottomless well, shows visions of the distant future if a coin is dropped into it.

rooms.name: room_9
rooms.description: A giant pile of rubble hides arrows.
